name: Price Table Block
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
With this Pricing Table block, you can instantly create a beautiful pricing menu for your eCommerce website within Gutenberg Editor.

Without any coding or hassle, it’ll take a few clicks to create a pricing table within Gutenberg block editor using this.

Completely Customizable: You can customize Pricing Table based on your product or service categories.
Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing.

Dedicated Support: We’ve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we’ll get back to you immediately.

🚀 BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This Block is brought to you by WPDeveloper, the team behind the most popular elements library Essential Addons for Elementor (used by almost 1 million+ happy users from 180+ countries).

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our documentation
  • To report issue and contribution visit Github.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at WPDeveloper.

🙌 JOIN THE COMMUNITY

🎦 Subscribe to our Youtube Channel to watch video tutorials on WordPress.
– 🤝 Join our Facebook Community & get connected with expert web creators like yourself.

🧡 LOVED PRICING TABLE BLOCK? Rate us on WordPress Repository

1.1.2 – 28/07/2021

  • Added: Alignment Option For Every Section
  • Improved: HTML Structure For CSS Issues

1.1.1 – 13/07/2021

  • Fixed: naming convention on block.json file
  • Fixed: remove extra block.json file

1.1.0 – 11/07/2021

  • Added: Preset Designs, More flexibility on controls
  • Added: Dynamic asset generation for inline styles
  • Added: Responsive control
  • Improved: Inspector panel design

1.0.1

  • Fix: Missing css, js files

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Pricing Table”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload price-table-block to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  • Improved: Font loader & controls

1.2.4 – 09/01/2023

  • Fixed: issue of enqueue css files

1.2.3 – 12/12/2022

  • Fixed: Minor bugs
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.2 – 12/09/2022

  • Added: Pricing table block with new options and preset
  • Added: Open new tab option for button link
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.1 – 02/06/2022

  • Added: Responsive Controls, Animation Controls, Custom CSS
  • Improved: Controls and structure
  • Fixed: Show block when using Gutenberg Block

1.2.0 – 09/02/2022

  • Added: Full site editing support
  • Improved: Controls and structure
  • Improved: Responsive device preview options synced with the WordPress’s default preview button.

1.1.3 – 23/08/2021

  • Improved: Security for asset generation
  • Fixed: Warning in controls
sections.reviews:
Easy and great IU

By vmooren on January 9, 2023

I was searching for a price table that fits my website. I found Price Table Block and I am really glad with it. There was some issue with the icons not showing, but I had great help from the support!

Super simple plugin

By jmomojo on August 21, 2022

This plugin worked perfectly. Did have to go through support for one answer, and they were very quick in replying and fixed the issue just as fast.
